title: Benfica vs Monaco Bet Builder Tips – 5/1 Champions League Special, Analysis & Predictions
description: Returning to Lisbon on Tuesday night holding a one-goal advantage, Benfica will be looking to officially extend on their Champions League adventure. title: Leeds United 2-1 Sunderland: Super sub Struijk seals dramatic comeback
description: An unlikely late double from substitute Pascal Struijk earned Leeds United a dramatic 2-1 victory over Sunderland to send Daniel Farke’s side back to the Championship summit. The victory saw Leeds extend their unbeaten run to 15 league matches, and are now seven points clear of third-placed Burnley with 13 games to play.
